name: FurAffinity - Monochrome Notification Icons
description:
A set of one-tone color coded icons for furaffinity.net's navigation bar. One for Submissions (Blue Hanging Canvas), Comments/Journals/Favorites/Watches (Green Word Bubble), Note (Yellow Note with Pen), Trouble Ticket (Red Bug).

Made by me. (Cheezy WEAPON)

user.name: Cheezy WEAPON
